bank

Class BankServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Server
      • bank.BankServer

  • public class BankServer
extends Server
    BankServer class contains the main logic to boot up a process in a connected network.
    See Also:
    Clique

      • BankServer

        public BankServer(java.lang.String name)
        BankServer constructor must supply a bank name.

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main creates a BankServer and executes it.

        Expects bank name as first argument, otherwise defaults to bank_default.

        Please follow this naming convention: bank_{name}

        Parameters:
        args - shell arguments passed in.
